definition: to share/to use in common/suitable/fit for purpose/useable
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Learn how to make some all-occasion cards using rubber stamps with flower designs.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何使一些全場合用花卡設計橡皮圖章。

sentences.english: I hate to sit there and look at the same stage scenery one scene after another.
sentences.chinese: 我看戲最討厭一幕接一幕合用一個佈景。

sentences.english: Every five children shared one textbook.
Arbutin combined with glycyrrhizin could inhibit LTB4 release from rat peritoneal macrophage.
sentences.chinese: 兩藥合用可抑制大鼠腹腔巨噬細胞釋放LTB4。

sentences.english: I hate to sit there and look at the same stage scenery one act after another .
sentences.chinese: 我看戲最討厭一幕接一幕合用一個佈景。

sentences.english: I would prefer a double-occupancy room shared with an American girl student.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能和一個美國女生合用一個雙人房間。

sentences.english: Those old dusters will become useful for polishing the car.
sentences.chinese: 那些舊撣子來撣汽車上的灰倒挺合用的。

sentences.english: The snowstorm was so terrible that I had to share an umbrella with Lin.
sentences.chinese: 暴風雪很可怕，我只能和林沖合用一把傘了。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that commuters should share their cars and give each other lifts.
sentences.chinese: 有人建議通勤者合用車輛，並讓彼此搭順路車。

sentences.english: A flat-rate party line with two subscribers.
sentences.chinese: 一種兩個用戶合用的包月制電話線。

sentences.english: In most cases, two persons are allowed to occupy a twin-bed room.
sentences.chinese: 在多數情況下，允許兩人合用一個雙人間。

sentences.english: It is indicated that XT & O can modulate the immune function in mice.
sentences.chinese: 說明夏塔熱片合用其軟膏能調節機體免疫功能。

sentences.english: Higher blood concentration of ceftiofur and longer half life can be observed when administered together with probenecid.
sentences.chinese: 與丙磺舒合用可提高血中藥物濃度和延長半衰期。

sentences.english: This program emphasizes the importance of theoretical and applicative knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 這一計劃強調了理論和合用的知識的重要性。

sentences.english: Echinacea purpurea combined with Astragalus surely have stranger immune-enhancing properties and role in promoting production.
sentences.chinese: 和黃芪合用對生產性能的促進作用更明顯。

sentences.english: Use of the two drugs together is presently FDA-approved.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止這兩種藥的合用還是FDA批准通過的。

definition: to blend two or more medicines/compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)
medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance
